casebody.data:
State of Connecticut v. Christopher Taft (3468)

Hull, Spallone and Bieluch, Js.

Argued April 3 — decision released April 22, 1986 John R. Williams, with whom, on the brief, was Bruce A. Sturman, public defender, for the appellant (defendant). James G. Clark, deputy assistant state’s attorney, with whom, on the brief, was Mary Galvin, assistant state’s attorney, for the appellee (state). Per Curiam.

There is no error.
